meanings.definition: Used to indicate a direction or location, as in "auf dem Tisch" (on the table).
meanings.sent1: The cat jumped auf the chair.
meanings.sent2: The book is auf the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The keys were hiding auf the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes focused auf the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The sun set auf the mountains.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate a state of being or action, as in "auf sein" (to be on).
meanings.sent1: She will auf the stage tonight.
meanings.sent2: The light is auf in the room.
meanings.sent3: The idea auf in his mind suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The music auf in the air.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate a time frame, as in "auf morgen" (until tomorrow).
meanings.sent1: We have to wait auf the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The event is scheduled auf next month.
meanings.sent4: Time slipped away auf the clock.
meanings.sent5: The flowers will bloom auf spring.
